issueDescription: It would be great to have a dark mode option for better readability at night.
The application crashes immediately after launching on Windows 10.
The setup instructions are missing for new users. Please add a section in the README file.
Adding a search bar would improve the user experience by allowing users to quickly find items.
The homepage takes too long to load, especially on mobile devices.
There is a potential SQL injection vulnerability in the login form.
Text overlaps in the settings menu when the window is resized to a smaller size.
Please add an option to export the report data to a CSV file.
The financial reports show incorrect calculations when including discounts.
Consider adding support for multiple languages to cater to a global audience.
The API documentation lacks usage examples. Adding them would help new developers.
Users are unable to upload files larger than 10MB. The process fails with a timeout error.
Adding two-factor authentication would enhance the security of user accounts.
Buttons need to be more accessible for users with disabilities. Consider increasing size and contrast.
Users are not receiving notifications for new messages.
The application causes high CPU usage, slowing down other processes on the system.

issueTitle: Feature request: Integration with third-party service
issueDescription: Please add integration with Service XYZ to streamline workflows.
Data does not sync across devices when using the mobile app.
The password reset functionality is vulnerable to brute force attacks.

issueTitle: UI Bug: Dropdown menu not working
issueDescription: The dropdown menu does not open on clicking in the profile settings.
Allow users to customize their dashboard with widgets and shortcuts.
Events show incorrect times for users in different time zones.
Implement keyboard shortcuts for common actions to improve productivity.
The API documentation lists outdated endpoints. Please update them to reflect the current version.
Form validation errors are not displayed properly, causing confusion for users.
Enable an offline mode that allows users to access and edit data without an internet connection.
Icons are misaligned on the toolbar when viewed on smaller screens.
Users are able to access restricted areas of the application without proper permissions.
The application has a memory leak that causes it to consume excessive memory over time.

issueTitle: Feature request: Support for custom themes
issueDescription: Allow users to create and apply custom themes to personalize the interface.
Search results do not update immediately after adding new items.
Improve error messages to provide more detail and guidance for users.
Dates are displayed in different formats across the application. Please standardize the date format.
Add features that allow multiple users to collaborate on the same project in real-time.

issueTitle: UI Bug: Modal window not closing
issueDescription: The modal window does not close when clicking the 'X' button in the top right corner.
Some parts of the application are not translated into the selected language.
Certain database queries take too long to execute, slowing down the application.
Implement webhook support to allow integration with external systems.

issueTitle: Bug: Image upload fails on mobile
issueDescription: Image uploads fail when using the mobile version of the application.
Enhance the mobile version of the application to be more responsive and user-friendly.
Sensitive data is being stored unencrypted. This poses a security risk.

issueTitle: UI Bug: Button hover state not working
issueDescription: The button hover state does not change when hovering over buttons in the main menu.
Users are not redirected to the login page after their session times out.
Add functionality to export reports and documents as PDF files.
Pagination does not work correctly on the search results page.
Implement audit logging to track changes and actions taken by users.
The application shows duplicate entries in the list view after refreshing.
Allow users to add custom fields to forms and reports.
Items are not sorted correctly by date in the activity feed.
Provide a toggle switch to enable or disable dark mode.
The application is vulnerable to cross-site scripting attacks. Input fields need proper sanitization.
Settings changes are not saved and are reverted to default after refreshing the page.
Implement single sign-on (SSO) integration to streamline user authentication.
The link to the privacy policy in the footer is broken and leads to a 404 page.
Add an activity feed to display recent actions and updates by users.
The notification bell icon does not show new notifications.
Add functionality to schedule tasks and reminders within the application.
Users are unable to upload or change their profile pictures.
Add tooltips to buttons and icons to provide additional information and improve usability.
The item count displayed on the dashboard does not match the actual number of items.
Enable bulk actions for managing multiple items at once, such as bulk delete or update.
The reset button in forms does not clear the fields as expected.
Implement user roles and permissions to control access to different parts of the application.
Font sizes are inconsistent across different sections of the application.
Send email notifications for important events and updates within the application.
Users are unable to delete items from their list. The delete action fails silently.
Allow users to add and manage tags for better organization of items.
Time is displayed incorrectly in the activity log. It appears to be off by several hours.
Implement real-time updates to reflect changes immediately without requiring a page refresh.
The sidebar menu does not expand when clicking on the sections.
The loading spinner is barely visible. Consider using a more prominent spinner.
Exporting data as CSV fails with an error message. The issue occurs intermittently.
